Token Allocation

Roadmap

This is the plan of this token going forward.

  • Mid Q2 2021

    Creating Solanight token

    We have created an SPL token that runs on the foundation of the Solana Chain Network which we name "Solanight".

  • Early Q3 2021

    Presale & Airdrop

    We will be holding a Presale and Airdrop to our community to introduce the "Solanight" token to the crowd.

  • Mid Q3 2021

    Listing on Dex

    We will release Market ID by listing on well-known DEXs such as Serum, Solape, Bonfida, Raydium, etc.

  • Late Q3 2021

    Listing on Coin-tracker site

    We will list the "Solanight" token on coin tracking sites such as Coingecko.com, Coinmarketcap.com, Solanabeach.io, etc.

  • Random Time

    Token burn

    We will burn the tokens if necessary and the burned tokens will be taken from 50% of the total supply and will be done gradually

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Story!

Token Presale

You can buy "Solanight" before DEX listing at a low price here.
